name: Captain Melon On A Mission
description:
Captian Melon on a Mission is a game in which the player has to navigate through a Kid's Bedroom encountering Jump and Run passages and strange inhabitants of the room. The goal is to escape the room through a ventilation shaft.

Install instruction

Extract all files from the zip package. The files should remain in the folder as they are. Simply double-click Captain Melon.exe to begin. Once that's done, you're set. Enjoy and have fun :)

Credits:
